review: ** ****** ** * ********* He's the pioneer in so many dental treatments in India,yet so humble and friendly. I got ceramic Braces fixed from him. Within such a short span, my teeth were visibly better aligned.Being a model, at times I have to get my braces removed and refixed .... But Dr has always been Extremely accommodative and co operating...******** * **** *** **** ******* ***** *** *** ****** *************** ****** ********* *** ** ******** ** ******* Aesthetic interiors and 'mkt competitive charges'... Every penny paid is worth for their Hi-tech and patient friendly clinic...hats off!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Anand at Cosmodent has completely transformed my smile and exceeded my expectations. The friendly staff immediately made me feel comfortable, and Dr. Anand's expertise and professionalism were truly exceptional. The state-of-the-art equipment and personalized care contributed to remarkable results. I highly recommend Dr. Anand for anyone seeking top-notch orthodontic care. Thank you for the unforgettable smile transformation!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I highly recommend docter Jyoti for dental treatment . She is not only perfect in her treatment but also a great human being . I felt so sorry for bugging her after my implants but she ensured to be there with me each time I needed her opinion and help . Also the ambience you this clinic is so positive half the fear vanishes the moment you step in and another half goes away when you meet docter Jyothi . Thank you docter Jyothi for being not only a great dentist but also a kind human being

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My kid is receiving excellent service from Dr. Narla and  he is  friendly, calm and patient . He ensures that we are properly informed about service and care. I would definitely recommend him to friends. Facility is very clean and maintains hygiene standards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Anand and Dr Jyoti are extremely humble and experts in their respective fields. They did not suggest any unnecessary solutions hence proving their expertise which in turn gains the patient trust. I would highly recommend both the doctors for any dental related procedures.
Very much satisfied with doctor's experience in his field. Clinic us also very well maintained and clean. Staff us very well behaved. Highly recommend this doctor and his his clinic to others.

Puts before you the alternatives possible for your problem and gives a comprehensive idea of them for you to understand and choose your treatment plan. Good communicator - perks being the way he addresses his patients (very friendly, I must say) and must have excelled in his studies too (seen certificates on the wall :P - trust boosting in some sense). Overall the best experience which I can expect from a dentist (orthodontist to be specific - I was there for getting braces on).
